sentence.Network_en: A water vole swam vigorously upstream.

sentence.Network_en: Clean - cultivation reduces vole survival and reproduction.

sentence.Network_en: The two vole species are not abundance than 99 % alike, genetically.
sentence.Network_cn: 如就基因而言,这两个物种超过99%的部份绝无二致.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent. (originally vole-mouse): from Norwegian voll(mus) 'field (mouse').

entry.def: A vole is a small animal that looks like a mouse but has very small ears and a short tail. Voles usually live in fields or near rivers.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various small mouselike rodents of the family Cricetidae (especially of genus Microtus) having a stout short-tailed body and inconspicuous ears and inhabiting fields or meadows
